price: (Nuhu aravuga ati) “Nyagasani wanjye! Mbabarira, njye n’ababyeyi banjye, n’uzinjira mu nzu yanjye ari umwemeramana, ndetse n’abemeramana n’abemeramanakazi. Kandi ntuzagire ikindi wongerera abahakanyi kitari ukorama.”
arabic: رَّبِّ ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَلِوَٰلِدَيَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيۡتِيَ مُؤۡمِنٗا وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارَۢا
